page.content: {WORK}_ In a survey of 59 local child_ ren in Millhouse the following results were obtained; 56 fathers and 25 mothers went out to work 34 mothers and 3 fathers did not. 19 mothers and 8 fathers were employed locally, the rest were employed throughout the reg_ ion, 8 in Sheffield, some further away {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STEVEN (AGED 11) Buzz!!! I slowly reach out and give my alarm clock a thump. Then my brother reaches down from the top bunk and pulls my covers off, and tells me to get up. I go to the bathroom and get washed and dressed, and go downstairs and get some sugar puffs. My brother makes me a cup of tea. My 3 dogs sit on my knee, expecting me to stroke them all at once.
